title.rendered: “Updates on IDF Casualties: Identifying Fallen Soldiers and Detailing Recent Injuries in Gaza Battles”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF spokesperson regarding the names of the two fallen IDF soldiers, which have been notified to their families: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC17122023.1812123418189

Here is a link to the IDF site, where they publish and update the details and pictures of the fallen soldiers: https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, a fighter (res.) from the Operational Hovering Unit (Hovlim) of the Merom Brigade was severely injured yesterday (Saturday) during a battle in the north of the Gaza Strip.

Furthermore, an officer and three reserve soldiers from Battalion 6623, ‘Spearhead’ formation (55), were severely injured yesterday (Saturday) in a battle in the south of the Gaza Strip.
